Importing Trashwheel

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
trash_df <- read_excel(
 "202509 Trash Wheel Collection Data.xlsx",
 sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
 range = "A2:N709",
 na = c("NA", ".", "")
) |>
 janitor::clean_names() |>
 mutate(
 table = "mr. trash wheel", 
 sports_balls = as.integer(round(sports_balls))
) |>
 select (dumpster, month, year, date, table, everything())
```
